content: The court ruled that the mayor's decision to use public funds to make a loan to assist a local business, which shortly afterward declared bankruptcy, had been within the scope of the mayor's discretionary powers in the normal discharge of his duties.
translations: ita:La corte ha stabilito che la decisione del sindaco di utilizzare fondi pubblici per effettuare un prestito per assistere
